Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add database entities and Doctrine configuration

Implement core data model for photo portfolio application:

Entities:
- Photo: Store photos with EXIF metadata, aspect ratios, and publication status
- Collection: Organize photos into albums with location, dates, and access control
- Post: Blog posts for Studio section with Markdown content
- Project: Portfolio case studies for Build section
- ApiToken: Bearer tokens for iOS Shortcut bulk upload authentication

Enums:
- PublishStatus: draft/published states
- AspectRatio: portrait/landscape/square/panorama classifications

Features:
- SHA256-based duplicate detection for photos
- JSON storage for EXIF data and visual styles
- Password-protected collections with session-based access
- Slug generation for SEO-friendly URLs

References: samwilkinson-ng5, samwilkinson-qa1, samwilkinson-yzf, samwilkinson-7wn

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
